thread.title: 30 Cute Prom Sneakers – Best Stylish Sneakers For Prom 2024
thread.title_full: 30 Cute Prom Sneakers – Best Stylish Sneakers For Prom 2024

author: Kelsey Stiegman
title: 30 Cute Prom Sneakers – Best Stylish Sneakers For Prom 2024
text:
Design by Yoora Kim Seventeen picks products that we think you'll love the most. We may earn commission from the links on this page.
On prom night you want to look like your regular self, but elevated . Because there's literally no point in spending hours getting all dressed up if at the end of it all, you feel uncomfortable with your own look. And if the real you wears sneakers almost every single day, you should skip the toe-pinching pumps and opt for cool sneaks on prom night, too.
We fully support your comfy-footed prom endeavors. The hard part is, finding a pair that still feels dressy enough for a ball gown type of evening. The secret is to shop options you already love, but with prom-y details. Do you live in Air Force 1s ? Go for a sleek metallic pair. Vans are your go-to? Slip into a tie-dye version. Plain white sneakers are your signature? Try a glitter option. All of those and more are right ahead for your shopping pleasure.
Our Top Picks

Converse All Star Radiating Love Sneaker Converse All Star Radiating Love Sneaker $70 at Revolve Be everyone's couple goal and wear cute matching Converse with hearts to your prom.
SHEIN Chain Decor Slip On Shoes SHEIN Chain Decor Slip On Shoes Now 34% Off $19 at Shein The chunky chain is the perfect touch to spice up these shoes.
 David's Bridal Crystal-Studded Slip-on Sneakers David's Bridal Crystal-Studded Slip-on Sneakers Now 15% Off $34 at David's Bridal If it shimmers, sign us up. These crystal slip-ons are too cute.
American Eagle Butterfly Canvas Platform Sneaker American Eagle Butterfly Canvas Platform Sneaker $40 at American Eagle If you're going for a fairycore or cottagecore aesthetic this prom, these may be perfect for you.
Keds Triple Kick Citrus Garden Party Sneaker Keds Triple Kick Citrus Garden Party Sneaker Now 39% Off $55 at Keds We can't get enough of these embroidered beauties perfect for a boho look.
 SHEIN Lace-up Front Skate Shoes SHEIN Lace-up Front Skate Shoes Now 30% Off $16 at Shein Confetti glitter sneakers just scream "party."
Roxy Slip On Platform Sneaker Roxy Slip On Platform Sneaker $59 at Amazon $53 at Zappos Elegant and sweet no matter what your prom dress style.
SHCRTK Low Top Lace Up Canvas Sneakers SHCRTK Low Top Lace Up Canvas Sneakers $30 at Amazon Sharpay called. She said she loves these shoes.
 Michael Kors Poppy Embellished Leather Stripe Sneaker Michael Kors Poppy Embellished Leather Stripe Sneaker Now 54% Off $185 at Michael Kors Simple with a pop of color for some fun.
BELOS Sparkly Lightweight Metallic Sequins Tennis Shoes BELOS Sparkly Lightweight Metallic Sequins Tennis Shoes $46 at Amazon Dance the night away in comfort and style with these bad boys.
asos Cali Dream sneakers asos Cali Dream sneakers $90 at ASOS Understated and comfy, but no less elegant.
 Michael Kors Maddy Leather and Glitter Chain-Mesh Trainer Michael Kors Maddy Leather and Glitter Chain-Mesh Trainer $225 at Michael Kors You could totally hit the gym after the dance if you really wanted to.
Fashion Nova Check Your Facts Platform Sneakers Fashion Nova Check Your Facts Platform Sneakers Now 40% Off $30 at Fashion Nova Too cool for school and perfect for prom.
journey Mayze FS Interest Platform Athletic Shoe journey Mayze FS Interest Platform Athletic Shoe Now 58% Off $40 at journeys.com If wearing sneakers to prom is wrong, then we don't want to be right, especially when they're as cute as these.
 Shoe Carnival Hike Platform Sneakers Shoe Carnival Hike Platform Sneakers Now 75% Off $10 at shoecarnival.com Who says your prom sneakers need to be all glitz and glammed? Simple black sneaks will make any look chic.
American Eagle Platform Cupsole Sneaker American Eagle Platform Cupsole Sneaker $40 at American Eagle The little pop of lavender on the sole is perfect.
Converse Lift Platform Canvas Converse Lift Platform Canvas $75 at Converse *Major* Hannah Montana Y2K Rockstar vibes, and we couldn't be more here for it.
 SHEIN Patch Detail Lace-up Front Wedge Sneakers SHEIN Patch Detail Lace-up Front Wedge Sneakers $34 at Shein These platform shoes give you the extra height of a heel in the comfort of sneaker.
BELOS Fashion Platform Women Sneakers BELOS Fashion Platform Women Sneakers $39 at Amazon Even if starry nights isn't your school's prom, these will give your friends major star eyes.
Kelsey Stiegman Senior Style Editor Kelsey is Seventeen.com's fashion expert and resident Harry Potter nerd. At the office, she spends her day writing about style, beauty, and literally every move Kylie Jenner makes. On the weekends, you can find her sifting through vintage shops and hunting for the perfect burger. Follow her on Instagram at @klstieg.
Briannah Rivera Editorial and Social Media Assistant Bri is the editorial and social media assistant at ELLE.com. Before joining the team at ELLE, she worked as the editorial assistant for Seventeen.com and Cosmopolitan.com where she covered all things celebrity news and pop culture. You can probably find her sipping an oatmilk iced chai while searching for the best new makeup products or thrifting her entire wardrobe.
